body.p: This method is a substitute for the method that works on OSI Layer 2 (only used by Linux agents). This method sends a magic-packet over UDP, usually port 7 or 9. This uses broadcast and won't normally work normally in routed networks, unless so-called directed broadcasts are configud on routers or L3 switches.
body.note: This method proves to be less reliable. You can have some computers not waking using this method.
